versions.title: Version 1.0 Patch Notes (v1.0)
notes: + Initial release of DF Overlay
+ Added real-time EXP/hr tracking
+ Added average EXP calculation
+ Added Next Level ETA
+ Added basic overlay with draggable UI
+ Added EXP graph foundation

versions.title: Version 1.1 Patch Notes (v1.1)
notes: + Added OCR-based hunger detection
+ Implemented hunger icon blinking when FINE
+ Added settings menu (F1) for basic customization
+ Improved overlay transparency and positioning
+ Added debug window

versions.title: Version 1.2 Patch Notes (v1.2)
notes: + Added configurable goal level ETA
+ Added EXP rate modes (RAW, AVG3, AVG5)
+ Added EXP graph polish and smoothing
+ Improved window dragging and UI scaling
+ General stability fixes

versions.title: Version 1.3 Patch Notes (v1.3)
notes: + Added scalable hunger icon
+ Added user-controlled icon size in Appearance tab
+ Improved image resizing and icon rendering
+ Added online version check and PID authorization
+ Added smooth graph rendering
+ Better UI scaling and font handling
+ Stability improvements and hunger sampling tweaks

versions.title: Version 1.4 Patch Notes (v1.4)
notes: + Added custom PID login window with Remember PID option
+ Added remote kill switch functionality
+ Added online patch notes viewer (from website JSON)
+ Separated Next Level and Goal Level rows for cleaner layout
+ Minor UI improvements and bug fixes
